Package gwt.g2d.client.graphics

Contains the framework for manipulating canvas using 2D context.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ImageLoader.CallBack Interface to allow anonymous instantiation of a CallBack Object with method that gets invoked when all the images are loaded.
 

Class Summary
Color Stores a color.
ColorStop A color stop in a gradient.
DashedLineRenderer Helper class for drawing dashed line.
DirectShapeRenderer Interface for manipulating the Surface's path drawing directly.
Gradient Represents a gradient which can be used for fill style or stroke style.
ImageLoader Provides a mechanism for deferred execution of a callback method once all specified Images are loaded.
KnownColor Contains a set of known colors.
LinearGradient Represents a linear gradient that paints along the line given by the coordinates.
RadialGradient Represents a radial gradient that paints along the cone given by the circles.
Surface The surface that an application uses to render to the screen.
TextMeasurer Helper class for measure the size of a text in pixels.
 

Enum Summary
Composition Determines how shapes and images are drawn onto the existing bitmap.
LineCap Defines the type of endings that UAs will place on the end of lines.
LineJoin Defines the type of corners that UAs will place where two lines meet.
PatternRepetition Determines the repetition mode of a pattern.
TextAlign Determines the text alignment settings.
TextBaseline Determines the text baseline alignment settings.
 

Package gwt.g2d.client.graphics Description

Contains the framework for manipulating canvas using 2D context.
